channel.title: Pip Boy 3000
channel.description:
What a bitch to model :eek:
It came out better than expected though and ill texture it better when i have more time. Till then ill probably spend my time modeling a Tesla helmet.
It didnt look this low poly in the editor until i rendered it, and it made me disappointed so i might possibly remake it.
Such a weird shape :rolleyes:
Note to self: Remove the shitty bevel where it says pip boy 3000 :|
[img]http://fc09.deviantart.com/fs47/f/2009/198/1/b/Pip_Boy_by_Frell262.jpg[/img]
[img]http://fc09.deviantart.com/fs46/f/2009/198/e/5/Pip_Boy_3000_by_Frell262.png[/img]
Im aware that the screen texture is off, i just threw it on for the render.
And for the people here who have no taste in games, a pip boy is a wrist computer from fallout that tells you your stats, equipment, health, xp etc.

item.title: Pip Boy 3000
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Either that or left handed people wear the PIP on their right hand, like watches

Never noticed that while playing the game but

item.title: Pip Boy 3000
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:4, topic:289377”]Looks good and all Frell except it’s backwards…
[/quote]
Im still confused at this, i used a fallout model dump, took the pip boy model and rendered the front and side of it and used it as reference pictures. The model possibly got mirrored when it was dumped/exported.

So its not a fail on my part

Read full topic

It’s not backwards, it’s upside down.

item.title: Pip Boy 3000
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Very clunky and unrealistic looking, but because you’re modeling something that isn’t real I don’t see why it matters. Unless you were aiming for realism that is. There’s a lot of small screwups all over it. The knobs don’t look real whatsoever, the visor for the screen runs into the dash for the knobs. The angle of the gear knob isn’t aligned with the opening it is coming out of. You use the Green theme for the pipboy? ew. Try the autumn, it is win.

Read full topic
